author: nero_eth
content:
I summarized the discussion from the last breakout call and it looks like there are two changes upcoming (both irrelevant for devnet-2):
* Apply item cap on BAL (consensus rule), [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11234).
* Apply gas budget feasibility checks (outside consensus; to protect against invalid block DoS), [PR](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/11223).

This is the post:
https://ethresear.ch/t/early-rejection-of-adversarial-bals/23995

author: marchhill
content: hey <@792404665068158998> just wanted to clarify, we are implementing the methods `engine_getPayloadBodiesBy...V2` instead of `eth_getBlockAccessListBy...` right? So I think this PR can be closed https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/726

author: nero_eth
content: both are needed I'd say. The engine getPayloadBodies is used by the CL whereas the RPC method is used by users
